author: rHoover
name: Zola
description:
Un-zip to ~/themes, or /usr/share/cinnamon for global access.

Zola is a slightly darkish, slightly bevelled, well gradiented theme designed to accomodate your GTK theme of choice.

Honestly, I'm a little nervous about this. I've wanted to make a contribution in return to Open Source for a while now, and this is it! My first. And I was able to do this because of the CSS-driven component of theming Cinnamon Menu.

But boy, what a CSS file it is! So I've undertaken this little project:

http://bit.ly/JmfCa0

on GitHub to try and bring some understanding to a complex structure.
